full_summary:
### **Title:** Janitorial Services Tender Notice for Rouge National Urban Park

### **Reference Number:** PW-23-01026493

### **Publication Date:** 2023-02-20

### **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-16T14:00:00 EST

#### **Project Overview:**

Parks Canada invites bids for the provision of janitorial services to support the operations of the Rouge National Urban Park (RNUP) Visitor Experience. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing a range of janitorial services, including labor, supervision, transportation, equipment, and supplies, at various locations throughout the park.

#### **Contract Details:**

*   Duration: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31, inclusive.
*   Option to Extend: The contract can be extended by up to two additional one-year periods.
*   Basis of Payment: Payments will be made in accordance with the applicable provisions set out in the Basis of Payment.

#### **Site Visit:**

A site visit is recommended to familiarize the bidder with the work site. Arrangements have been made for the site visit to be held at 10725 Reesor Road, Markham, ON L6B 1A8 on February 24, 2023. Bidders must confirm their attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

#### **Submission Requirements:**

*   Bids must be submitted via fax or email to the address provided in the tender documents.
*   Emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted. Bid documents must be sent as email attachments.
*   The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes.

#### **Enquiries:**

*   All technical and contractual enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority and must be received no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

#### **Procurement Information:**

*   National Parks Regulations require that all work is performed according to the National Park Act.
*   Bidders that consider themselves qualified to provide this work should obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. Addenda, when issued, will be available from the Government of Canada tendering service.

Gate!

*   Lists (unordered) when describing categories
